H0.text: On which river does the Scottish city of Stirling lie. River Tay

H1.text: On which river does the Scottish city of Stirling lie. River Clyde

H2.text: On which river does the Scottish city of Stirling lie. River Dee

H3.text: On which river does the Scottish city of Stirling lie. Forth

A4.text: From Stirling, the Forth flows east, accepting the Bannock Burn from the south before passing the town of Fallin.

A5.text: The Forth rises in the Trossachs, a mountainous area 30 km (19 mi) west of Stirling.
